      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(android.content.Context context,
                      android.content.Intent intent)
        Specified by:
        onReceive in class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

      • lookupMenu

        public java.lang.String lookupMenu(java.lang.String type)
        Allows for an application to lookup what type of menu might be provided for a specific map menu type.
        Parameters:
        type - the string of the type to match
        Returns:
        the stringified menu - this could have submenus which is the responsibility of the caller of this method to lookup.

      • lookupMenu

        public java.lang.String lookupMenu(MapItem mi)
        Allows for an application to lookup what type of menu might be provided for a specific map menu type.
        Parameters:
        mi - the map item to match
        Returns:
        the stringified menu - this could have submenus which is the responsibility of the caller of this method to lookup.

      • registerMenu

        public void registerMenu(java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String menu)
        Allows for an application to register a globally used menu for a specific Map Item type. This is the same as calling sendBroadcast of the intent com.atakmap.android.maps.REGISTER_MENU with the String type and the String menu.
        Parameters:
        type - the string of the type to match
        menu - the stringified menu

      • unregisterMenu

        public void unregisterMenu(java.lang.String type)
        Allows for an application to unregister a globally used menu for a specific Map Item type.
        Parameters:
        type - the string of the type to match

      • hideMenu

        public void hideMenu()

      • addEventListener

        public void addEventListener(MapMenuEventListener listener)
        Add a listener to MapMenuWidget lifecycle events. Listeners are visited prior to menu display. Listeners should return true when the menu should not be created.
        Parameters:
        listener - receives fully formed menus after creation prior to display

      • removeEventListener

        public void removeEventListener(MapMenuEventListener listener)
        Remove menu event listener from receiving lifecycle events.
        Parameters:
        listener -

      • getMenuWidget

        public static MenuLayoutWidget getMenuWidget()
        Gets root level MenuLayoutWidget. This layout widget is the parent of all displayed radial menus.
        Returns:
        layout widget

      • getCurrentItem

        public static MapItem getCurrentItem()
        Find the map item that the radial is currently opened on
        Returns:
        Focused map item

      • registerMapMenuFactory

        public boolean registerMapMenuFactory(MapMenuFactory factory)
        Add an additional map menu factory that creates radial menus. Factories return a MapMenuWidget in response to a MapItem. Factories should return a "default" menu when the provided item is null.
        Parameters:
        factory - creator of fully populated MapItemWidgets

      • unregisterMapMenuFactory

        public boolean unregisterMapMenuFactory(MapMenuFactory factory)
        Removes an added map menu factory.
        Parameters:
        factory - instance to be removed from list of factories
        Returns:
        whether a factory was actually removed from the list.
